price: 4. Kasi tobomaka mboka moko te sé ezala na mokano moyebani mosila kokomama.
arabic: وَمَآ أَهۡلَكۡنَا مِن قَرۡيَةٍ إِلَّا وَلَهَا كِتَابٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: wamā ahlaknā min qaryatin illā walahā kitābun maʿlūmun
